text: Arra ni tsuite, kyogi o tsukuriageru ijo ni, fugi o okonau mono ga arou ka. Mata nani mo keiji o ukenainoni `watashi ni, keiji ga kudatta.' To iu mono. Aruiwa `watashi wa arra ga kudasa reta no to, nitamono o kudaseru.' To iu mono (ijo ni fugimono ga arou ka). Korera no fugi no to ga, makki no tsuku no naka de, tenshi-tachi ga te o sashidashite,`anata gata no tamashi o watase. Anata gata wa arra ni tsuite, shinjitsude wanai koto o ittari sono shirushi ni taishite 倣慢Na taido o totte ki tari shita koto ni, hazubeki chobatsu o no ku noda.' To iu toki no sugata o anata (muhanmado) ni misete yaritai monodearu
